short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick colors from web pages, color picker and your personal color history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our lightweight eyedropper extension, you can quickly select colors from webpages or from advanced color picker. 

The extension lets you get the exact HEX/RGB/HSV value and keep the history of picked colors. It is very nice for any graphics designers or web developers, or for anyone who just really likes colors. 

This extension doesn't collect or store any personal information. We've also included some of our other extensions at the bottom for your added convenience and enjoyment.
